schema.name: Healthyfied Buttered Garlic Clam

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the minced garlic to the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant and golden, stirring often to prevent burning.
Add the clams and water to the garlic butter mixture. Increase the heat to high, cover the pan with a lid, and allow to cook for 5-7 minutes, until the clams open.
Once the clams are cooked and open, drizzle with lemon juice and gently mix in the grape juice for a slight sweet note.
Serve the clams hot, ensuring not to consume any that did not open.

schema.description: This Healthyfied Buttered Garlic Clam recipe is perfect for those seeking to make healthier choices without compromising on flavor. Featuring low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar ingredients, this recipe transforms a classic dish into a guilt-free pleasure. Dive into the succulent taste of hard shell clams, complemented by the richness of unsalted butter and the aromatic punch of garlic, all while maintaining a nutritious profile.
